zaptestsuite module¶

class zaptestsuite.ZapTestSuite(engine_name='Custom Engine')¶

Bases: testsuite.TestSuite

Module to automate use of ZAP and its API

connect(scheme, address, port)¶

Connect to the targetURL. ZAP can only connect to one target at the time, so this must be performed in the run function as well.

generate_test_list(testfile='tests.csv')¶

This function must make a array of Test objects representing each of the tests that can be executed by the engine. The list must be compatible for the run_tests function

Returns:List of Test objects
Return type:Array[Test…]
import_policy(file='testpolicy.xml', name='testpolicy')¶

Import testing policy from file. This makes the initial configuration of which tests that are enabled. As well as other policies such as strength and sensitivity

Parameters:
  • path (str) – File path to config file
  • name (str) – Policy name, may be useful for the engine
run_tests(tests)¶

Run all enabled tests against the target url. The Test objects within the tests array describes each test. The array should be changed according to how the outcome of the tests are and returned

Parameters:tests (Array[Test...]) – Array of Test objects
Returns:Array of test objects
Return type:Array[Test…]
scan_active = False¶
shutdown()¶

Properly shut down the zap engine

start()¶

Start the ZAP engine in the background

stop()¶

Stop all running tests

target_address = ''¶
zap = None¶
